name: Rsquared Communication
tag_list: public-relations, saas, cloud, tech-pr, b2b, enterprise, smb
description: A boutique tech PR firm based in SF, CA
overview: Rsquared Communication takes companies from launch through mainstream adoption by securing top-tier media opportunities and implementing cohesive external communication strategies that employ a mix of media and influencer relationship building, timing, and passion. The company specializes in B2B web applications and present and past clients include companies such as Zendesk, FreshBooks, and HootSuite.
